Name: Figure Simulator War
About the game: simultaneous action strategy set your own battlefield freely what kind of battlefield depends on your imagination game overview heroes can build all kinds of arms and defense towers in front of them at any time. Building units consume energy, which increases with time. The hero can also attack alone and release the skill to smash the enemy castle. Different players who are good at action and strategy can play different scenes. level editor: place barracks and environment to fight immediately. It is intuitive and convenient and does not need to learn. After opening the creative workshop, the level can be shared. internal capacity the eight heroes have their own tactical skills. 19 arms, including soldiers, archers, mages, Musketeers, crash vehicles, mecha, etc. 50 + official level level editor, scene module 100+ the above contents continue to increase
